item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克称春末之前经济不可能明朗化
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政策和其他因素对经济的影响可能还需要几个月才能明朗，这表明官员们可能会在至少春末之前保持利率稳定。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said it could be several months before there’s clarity on how President Donald Trump’s policies and other factors will affect the economy, suggesting officials could hold rates steady until at least late spring.】

item.title: 罕见气旋尚未登陆便在澳大利亚造成严重破坏
item.description: 一场逼近澳大利亚第三大城市布里斯班的气旋--该地区 50 多年来的第一场气旋--在登陆之前就已经造成了混乱，狂风刮倒了电线，切断了数千家庭的电力供应。【原文：A cyclone approaching Australia’s third-largest city Brisbane — the region’s first in more than 50 years — is already causing mayhem before it makes landfall, with gale force winds downing power lines and cutting electricity supply to thousands of homes.】

item.title: 澳大利亚生物技术公司 PolyNovo 因首席执行官被要求辞职而股价暴跌
item.description: 周五，澳大利亚医疗公司保利诺有限公司（PolyNovo Ltd.）宣布要求首席执行官斯瓦米-拉奥特（Swami Raote）卸任，导致该公司股价暴跌。【原文：Shares in PolyNovo Ltd. tumbled on Friday after the Australian medical firm said it asked Chief Executive Officer Swami Raote to step down from his role.】

item.title: 澳大利亚家庭支出增长，支持澳大利亚央行的谨慎态度
item.description: 澳大利亚家庭支出在 1 月份有所增长，表明今年开局良好，同时也强化了央行在降息后的谨慎态度。【原文：Australia’s household spending strengthened in January, suggesting the year opened on a positive note while reinforcing the central bank’s cautious approach after cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 星空娱乐与周大福、远东的交易谈判失败
item.description: Star Entertainment Group Ltd.称，与合作伙伴周大福企业有限公司（Chow Tai Fook Enterprises Ltd.）和远东财团企业有限公司（Far East Consortium Enterprises Ltd.）就出售该公司在布里斯班一家赌场合资企业中的股份进行的谈判未能达成交易。【原文：Star Entertainment Group Ltd. said talks with partners Chow Tai Fook Enterprises Ltd. and Far East Consortium Enterprises Ltd. to sell the company’s stake in a Brisbane casino venture have failed to produce a deal.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴 ADR 突然折价显示对中美脱钩的担忧
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）限制美国对华投资的举措正在考验着理论上应该是铁板一块的金融关系，即在纽约和香港交易的中国股票之间的紧密联系。【原文：Donald Trump’s push to restrict US investments in China is testing what in theory should be an ironclad financial relationship — the tight link between Chinese shares trading in New York and Hong Kong.】

item.title: 随着市场复苏，美国银行首席执行官愿意在日本招聘员工
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.首席执行官布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）表示，随着日本经济在经历数十年通货紧缩后回暖，他愿意在日本增加员工。【原文：Bank of America Corp. Chief Executive Officer Brian Moynihan said he’s willing to add employees in Japan as the local economy picks up after decades of deflation.】

item.title: 乌克兰在战争中对 "星链 "的依赖难以打破
item.description: 战争摧毁了乌克兰的电信基础设施，乌克兰只能依靠埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 "星链 "公司（Starlink）提供的卫星通信。【原文：Ukraine, reliant on satellite communications from Elon Musk’s Starlink in a war that’s decimated the country’s telecommunications infrastructure, is finding that there’s no easy way out.】

item.title: 在政策影响到来之前，美国 2 月份招聘工作将保持健康态势
item.description: 上个月，美国雇主可能增加了大量工作岗位，表明劳动力市场在政策不确定性增加的情况下依然保持稳定。【原文：US employers likely added a solid number of jobs last month, showcasing a labor market that held steady in the face of mounting policy uncertainty.】

item.title: 受关税动荡影响，石油将创 10 月以来最大单周跌幅
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对主要贸易伙伴陆续征收关税，给全球市场注入了波动性和不确定性，石油有望创下 10 月份以来的最大单周跌幅。【原文：Oil was on track for the biggest weekly decline since October as US President Donald Trump’s on-off tariffs against major trading partners injected volatility and uncertainty into global markets.】

item.title: 数以千计的猫耳机器人在日本餐厅候座
item.description:
随着日本应对劳动力短缺，服务机器人市场有望在未来五年内增长两倍。【原文：

As Japan copes with a labor shortage, the service robot market is expected to triple in the next five years.

】

item.title: 华尔街情绪低迷，亚洲股市下挫：市场综述
item.description: 周五，在华尔街交易员在关税标题的鞭挞下引导股市下跌后，亚洲股市早盘开始下跌。【原文：Asian equities primed for early declines on Friday after Wall Street traders navigated falling stocks amid whipsawing tariff headlines.】

item.title: 美国联邦政府申请失业救济人数连续两周居高不下
item.description: 随着特朗普政府大幅缩减联邦政府规模，联邦雇员申请失业救济的人数连续两周保持在较高水平。【原文：Applications for unemployment benefits filed by federal employees remained at an elevated level for a second week as the Trump administration moves to dramatically shrink the size of the federal government.】

item.title: 联邦通信委员会要求 13 家公共广播电台提供赞助详情
item.description: 联邦通信委员会致函 13 家公共广播电台，要求它们在 3 月 31 日前汇编材料，详细说明过去的赞助情况。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission sent letters to 13 public radio stations asking them to compile materials detailing past sponsorships by March 31, according to people familiar with the effort.】

item.title: 蒙特利尔银行首席执行官因未完成财务目标连续第三次减薪
item.description: 蒙特利尔银行首席执行官达里尔-怀特（Darryl White）和其他高管的薪酬在 2024 年有所下降，因为该银行全年都在应对贷款损失增加的问题。【原文：Bank of Montreal Chief Executive Officer Darryl White and other executives saw their pay fall in 2024 as the bank dealt with elevated loan losses throughout the year.】

item.title: KKR 看好亚太地区 18 亿美元的高等级信贷机会
item.description: KKR & Co.称，投资者忽视了亚太地区的投资级信贷市场，从而错失了获取回报的良机。【原文：Investors are missing an opportunity to generate returns by ignoring the investment-grade credit market in the Asia-Pacific region, according to KKR & Co.】

item.title: 加密货币领袖齐聚白宫，储备问题扑面而来
item.description: 二十多位加密货币高管、投资者和知名人士预计将于周五齐聚白宫，既庆祝唐纳德-特朗普的再次当选，又谋划在这位对行业友好的总统领导下的未来发展方向。【原文：More than two dozen crypto executives, investors and personalities are expected to gather at the White House on Friday, both to celebrate the re-election of Donald Trump and to plot a course going forward under the industry-friendly president.】

item.title: 贝恩和 CC Capital 将收购 Insignia 的报价提高至 22 亿美元
item.description: 贝恩资本（Bain Capital）和CC资本（CC Capital）分别提高了对Insignia金融有限公司的收购报价，澳大利亚金融服务公司的竞购战愈演愈烈。【原文：Bain Capital and CC Capital each increased their takeover offers for Insignia Financial Ltd., as the bidding battle for the Australian financial services firm ramped up.】

item.title: 博通预测增长强劲，称人工智能支出步入正轨
item.description: 苹果公司和其他大型科技公司的芯片供应商博通公司（Broadcom Inc.【原文：Broadcom Inc., a chip supplier for Apple Inc. and other big tech companies, gave an upbeat revenue forecast, reassuring investors that spending on artificial intelligence computing remains healthy.】

item.title: 阿波罗、维斯特里亚权衡首次公开募股或出售凤凰城大学
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. and The Vistria Group are exploring options including a sale or initial public offering for online education company Apollo Education Group, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒尔仍认为 2025 年有可能减息两到三次
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）表示，他不支持在 3 月份降息，但认为今年还有降息两次、甚至三次的空间。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said he wouldn’t support lowering interest rates in March, but sees room to cut two, or possibly three, times this year.】

item.title: HPE 因盈利前景黯淡而下跌；将裁员 3,000 人
item.description: 惠普企业公司（Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co.【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co. plunged about 15% after providing an annual profit outlook that fell short of investor expectations and announcing plans to eliminate about 3,000 positions.】

item.title: 特朗普对人工智能发展前景的豪赌
item.description:
新一届政府重新思考了公共研究资金的问题，并让私营公司来规划未来的道路。【原文：

The new administration rethinks public funding for research, leaving it to private companies to chart the path ahead. 

】

item.title: Spotify 去年股价飙升，但势头尚未波及各大唱片公司
item.description:
Spotify 的市值已达到约 1100 亿美元。这比华纳音乐集团和环球音乐的市值总和还要多。【原文：

Spotify’s market cap has reached roughly $110 billion. That’s more than Warner Music Group and Universal Music combined.

】

item.title: 秘鲁新任财政部长寄希望于减税将经济增长率提高到 4
item.description: 秘鲁新任财政部长在上任之初就推出了一系列税收激励措施，希望将经济增长速度提高到七年来的最快水平（不包括大流行病的反弹）。【原文：Peru’s new finance minister is pushing an array of tax incentives early in his tenure in a bid to boost economic growth to its fastest pace in seven years, excluding the pandemic rebound.】

item.title: Alvogen Pharma 发放私人信用贷款以解决再融资问题
item.description: Alvogen Pharma US Inc.已安排了一笔由 Centerbridge Partners 主导的新私人贷款，这将缓解这家仿制药生产商因预计收入下降而面临的短期再融资压力。【原文：Alvogen Pharma US Inc. has arranged a new private loan led by Centerbridge Partners that will ease near-term refinancing pressure as the generic drugs maker grapples with projected revenue declines.】

item.title: 因财政问题，惠誉将哥伦比亚的前景展望降至负面
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）周四将哥伦比亚的评级展望从稳定下调至负面，理由是该国财政收支状况恶化，短期内采取纠正措施的前景存疑。【原文：Fitch Ratings lowered Colombia’s rating outlook to negative from stable on Thursday, citing the deterioration of the country’s fiscal balance and doubts about prospects for corrective measures in the short term, while it affirmed the credit score at BB+.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉将把拖欠雪佛龙公司的债务再投资于当地石油工业
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普给石油巨头雪佛龙公司一个月的时间停止在这个南美国家生产石油之后，委内瑞拉将把欠雪佛龙公司的债务进行再投资。【原文：Venezuela will reinvest the debt it owes to Chevron Corp. after US President Donald Trump gave the oil giant one month to stop producing oil in the South American nation.】

item.title: 美国电网运营商因加拿大电力进口而焦头烂额
item.description: 美国东北部的电网运营商不知道如何应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对从加拿大进口的电力征收的关税—；甚至不知道这些电力是否需要缴纳关税。【原文：Northeastern US grid operators don’t know how to deal with US President Donald Trump’s tariffs on power imported from Canada — or if the electricity is even subject to duties.】
